CatDescriptText: This group of women went to the University of Pittsburgh football games faithfully and referred to themselves as "The Four Skunks." Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 30, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "Panther Boosters - The 'Nutcrackers,' a group of chic co-eds who attend the University of Pittsburgh were justly proud of the Pitt Panthers last Saturday when they trampled Penn State. In their unique club uniform are: kneeling, Yvonne Jackson; standing (left to right), Marilyn Ware, Sylvia Greene and Gloria Cosby. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of members of the "Nutcrackers" or "The Four Skunks" wearing matching knickers, dark double breasted coats, and long light colored stocking caps, standing from left: Marilyn Ware [Parker], Sylvia Green, Gloria Cosby; and Yvonne Jackson kneeling in front, posed in Harris Studio
